caption:
Ready to refresh your space and cleanse from the inside out? 🌿✨ We’ve teamed up with @juna.world & @jolieskinco to give three lucky winners the ultimate detox package!

Here’s how to enter:

1️⃣ Follow @‌juna.world @blueairus & @‌jolieskinco

2️⃣ Like this post

3️⃣ Tag a friend

💙 BONUS: Share this post to your story and tag us for an extra entry!

You could be winning:
✨ The Blueair 211i Max Air Purifier for cleaner, fresher air at home

✨ A 3-month supply of Juna Detox Drops to support your body’s natural detox

✨ A Jolie Shower Head for the cleanest water and skin-friendly showers

NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. Void where prohibited. The Blueair x Juna World x Jolie Giveaway is sponsored by Blueair, Inc. Open to legal residents of the 50 U.S. & D.C., 18+. Begins once the sweepstakes post goes live on Instagram on 2/10/24 & ends at 11:59 p.m. ET on 2/17/24. For official rules, visit the #linkinbio
